means: 初学者的好运气（或意外成功）

sentence.Network_en: She was taking quick puffs at her cigarette like a beginner.
sentence.Network_cn: 她像刚开始抽烟的人一样很快地吸着。

sentence.Network_en: As a beginner, everything is very new to him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他刚起步, 对一切都很生疏.

sentence.Network_en: The young man is a raw beginner.

jx.jx_en_mean: good luck supposedly experienced by a beginner at a particular activity
jx.jx_cn_mean: 新手的好运气（据信新手在做事总会碰到好运）

encyclopedia.content: Beginner为AKB48的第18首单曲。于2010年10月27日开始贩售，AKB48第一张百万单曲，单曲累计销量达1,034,582张。（现在是动漫《AKB0048》的插曲）简介 与前作相同，2种通常盘及剧场盘同时发行。而2种通常盘各自收录的歌曲是相异的。而在DVD当中的映像，则收录了Beginner不同队形的Dance Shot，各通常盘都会收录3种不同的影像。 此外，成员会组成“Under Girls”，担纲演唱c/w曲‘专属于我的Value’（仆だけのvalue）收录于单曲中。

entry.def: A beginner is someone who has just started learning to do something and cannot do it very well yet.

example.ex: The course is suitable for beginners and advanced students...
example.tran: 这门课程适合初学者和高级程度的学生。

example.ex: I am a complete beginner to bird-keeping.
example.tran: 在养鸟方面，我完全是一个新手。

means.word_mean: 1. someone new to a field or activity
2. a person who founds or establishes some institution;

sentences.sentence: "George Washington is the father of his country"

sentences.en: He plays well enough for a beginner.
sentences.cn: 对于初学者来说,他弹奏得相当不错。

As a beginner,everything is very new to him.

means.word_mean: 初学者的好运气(或意外成功)；侥幸

sentences.en: ‘You won the game! Well done!’ ‘It was probably just beginner’s luck.’
sentences.cn: “你赢了！干得不错！”“这很可能是新手的好运气。”
